summary.span: 表示 16 位有符号整数。

span.span: Represents a 16-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值类型表示其值范围从负32768到正32767的带符号整数。The value type represents signed integers with values ranging from negative 32768 through positive 32767. 此类型提供将此类型的实例的值转换为其字符串表示形式的方法，将数字的字符串表示形式转换为此类型的实例，以及比较此类型的实例。This type provides methods to convert the value of an instance of this type to its string representation, to convert the string representation of a number to an instance of this type, and to compare instances of this type. 您还可以调用类的成员 来执行各种数值运算，包括获取数字的绝对值、计算从整数相除的商和余数、确定两个整数的最大值或最小值、获取数字的符号以及对数字进行舍入。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. 有关格式规范代码如何控制值类型的字符串表示形式的信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For information about how format specification codes control the string representation of value types, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types).

threadsafe.span: 此类型的所有成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: All members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 看似修改实例状态的成员实际上返回用新值初始化的新实例。

span.span: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.

threadsafe.span: 与任何其他类型一样，读取和写入包含此类型的实例的共享变量时，必须通过锁保护以保证线程安全。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

Microsoft c # 编译器生成指令以将参数的值表示为 对象，然后生成一个 方法，该方法将实例的值 与 参数表示形式进行比较。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an object, then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅编程语言的文档，以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 多个值和引用类型的方法的泛型和非泛型版本。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the method for several value and reference types. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 使用当前区域性的对象设置默认 ( "G" 或常规) 格式的值的格式 。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of the current culture. 如果要指定其他格式或区域性，请使用方法的其他重载 ，如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |使用格式To use format|对于区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定格式A specific format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这些支持：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅 [标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) 和 [自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法将值的数组显示 到控制台。The following example uses the method to display an array of values to the console. [!code-csharp[System.Int16.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int16.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 使用指定区域性的对象设置默认 ( "G" 或常规) 格式的值的格式 。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果要指定其他格式或当前区域性，请使用方法的其他重载，如下所示 ：If you want to specify a different format or the current culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |使用格式To use format|对于区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定格式A specific format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这些支持：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅 [标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) 和 [自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). `provider`参数是一个 实现，其 方法返回 对象。The `provider` parameter is an implementation whose method returns a object. 通常， `provider` 是 对象或 对象。Typically, `provider` is a object or a object. 对象提供有关此方法返回的字符串格式的区域性特定信息。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of the string returned by this method. 如果 `provider` 为 `null` ，则此实例的格式为 当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null`, this instance is formatted with the object for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例循环访问值的数组 ，并通过 使用不同的格式提供程序调用方法，将其中的每个值显示到控制台。The following example iterates an array of values and displays each of them to the console by calling the method with different format providers. 由于默认的 "G" 格式说明符定义了简单格式，因此无论参数的值是什么，为每个值生成的格式化字符串 都是相同的 `provider` 。Because of the simple formatting defined by the default "G" format specifier, the formatted strings produced for each value are identical regardless of the value of the `provider` parameter. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 使用 表示当前区域性约定的对象来设置指定格式的值的格式。The method formats an value in a specified format by using a object that represents the conventions of the current culture. 如果要使用默认 ( "G" 或常规) 格式或指定不同的区域性，请使用方法的其他重载，如下所示 ：If you want to use the default ("G", or general) format or specify a different culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |使用格式To use format|对于区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `format`参数可以是标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 除了 "R" (或 "r" ) 之外的所有标准数字格式字符串，都支持所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果 `format` 为 `null` 或空字符串，则此实例的返回值的格式为常规数字格式说明符 ( "G" ) 。If `format` is `null` or an empty string, the return value of this instance is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这些支持：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅 [标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) 和 [自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). 此实例的返回值的格式为 当前区域性的。The return value of this instance is formatted with the for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例对两个值进行初始化 ，并使用每个受支持的标准格式字符串和多个自定义格式字符串将它们显示到控制台。The following example initializes two values and displays them to the console using each of the supported standard format strings and several custom format strings. 此示例是以 en-us 作为当前区域性运行的。The example is run with en-US as the current culture. [!code-csharp[System.Int16.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Int16.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 使用 指定的区域性的对象设置指定格式的值的格式。The method formats an value in a specified format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果要使用默认格式或区域性设置，请使用方法的其他重载 ，如下所示：If you want to use default format or culture settings, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |使用格式To use format|对于区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认 ( "G" ) 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定格式A specific format|默认 (当前) 区域性Default (current) culture|| `format`参数可以是标准或自定义数字格式字符串。The `format` parameter can be either a standard or a custom numeric format string. 除了 "R" (或 "r" ) 之外的所有标准数字格式字符串，都支持所有自定义数字格式字符。All standard numeric format strings other than "R" (or "r") are supported, as are all custom numeric format characters. 如果 `format` 是 `null` 或空字符串 ( "" ) ，则此方法返回的字符串的格式为常规数字格式说明符 ( "G" ) 。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the string returned by this method is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，以下格式设置主题更详细地介绍了这些支持：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅 [标准数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) 和 [自定义数字格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅 [格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). `provider`参数是一个 实现。The `provider` parameter is an implementation. 其 方法返回一个 对象，该对象提供有关此方法返回的字符串格式的区域性特定信息。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象 可以是以下任一项：The object that implements can be any of the following: - 表示要使用其格式设置规则的区域性的对象。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - 一个 包含此值的特定数字格式信息的对象。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现的自定义对象 。A custom object that implements . 如果 `provider` 为 `null` ，或者 无法从获取对象，则 `provider` 返回值的格式为 当前区域性的。If `provider` is `null`, or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted with the for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例 使用四个不同区域性中的每个受支持的标准格式字符串来显示值。The following example displays an value using each of the supported standard format strings in four different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.Int16.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/cs/ToString1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Int16.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.ToString/vb/ToString1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法与方法的区别在于， 返回一个布尔值，该值指示分析操作是否成功，而不是返回分析的 值。The method differs from the method by returning a Boolean value that indicates whether the parse operation succeeded instead of returning the parsed value. 这样，便无需使用异常处理来测试无效的 事件， `s` 也不能成功分析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed. `s`参数应为以下形式的数字的字符串表示形式：The `s` parameter should be the string representation of a number in the form: ws[sign] 位数 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 方括号 ( [和] ) 中的项是可选的。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|说明Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选空白。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选的符号。An optional sign.| |*位数**digits*|介于0到9之间的一系列数字。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`使用样式对参数进行解释 。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除十进制数字外，只允许使用前导和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要使用中提供的区域性特定格式设置信息显式定义样式元素 `s` ，请使用 方法。To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`使用为 当前系统区域性初始化的对象中的格式设置信息分析参数。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current system culture. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 此方法的重载将 参数中的所有数字解释 `s` 为十进制数字。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要分析十六进制数的字符串表示形式，请调用 重载。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例 使用多个不同的字符串值调用方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. [!code-csharp[System.Int16.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int16.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int16.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)] 在此示例中，此方法无法转换的某些字符串是：Some of the strings that the method is unable to convert in this example are: - "9432.0"."9432.0". 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含小数分隔符;它必须仅包含整数位数。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only. - "16,667"."16,667". 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含组分隔符;它必须仅包含整数位数。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only. - "(100)"."(100)". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含由当前区域性的和属性定义的负号 。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's and properties. - "01FA"."01FA". 转换失败，因为字符串不能包含十六进制数字;它只能包含十进制数字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.
